abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects for information related to a Fibre Channel network's Domain Management. At present, this memo is a work item of T11.5 (http://www.t11.org). The plan is that it will later become a work item of the IETF's IMSS working group.
